detaileddescription.para: Ryan Curtin This is a model for nearest or furthest neighbor search. It is useful in that it provides an easy way to serialize a model, abstracts away the different types of trees, and also (roughly) reflects the NeighborSearch API and automatically directs to the right tree type. It is meant to be used by the knn and kfn bindings.
